verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת־ <WH8141> bish-nat- year שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> She-va' In the seventh לְיֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> le-ye-Hu of Jehu מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach began to reign יְהוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH3060> ye-ho-'Ash, Jehoash וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach reigned בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> im-Mo, And his mother's צִבְיָ֖ה <WH6645> tziv-Yah [was] Zibiah מִבְּאֵ֥ר mib-be-'Er שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> Sha-va'. of Beersheba

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as did יְהוֹאָ֧שׁ <WH3060> ye-ho-'Ash And Jehoash הַיָּשָׁ֛ר <WH3477> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יָמָ֑יו <WH3117> ya-Mav; all his days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הוֹרָ֔הוּ <WH3384> ho-Ra-hu, instructed יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' wherein Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen. the priest

רַ֥ק <WH7535> rak but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> hab-ba-Mot But the high places לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- were not סָ֑רוּ <WH5493> Sa-ru; were not taken away ע֥וֹד <WH5750> od still הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <WH2076> me-zab-be-Chim still sacrificed וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> u-me-kat-te-Rim and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <WH1116> bab-ba-Mot. in the high places
